item.description:
This a long-anticipated first for the board game group: Texas Hold 'Em Poker Night. Kim and Kate will be the hosts for evening in Haverhill. They ask that you bring your favorite poker/finger food or drink. To make the evening more interesting and to provide something for the winners, there will be a $1 buy-in.

For those who have never played, have no fear, Texas Hold 'Em is very easy to learn and there is no shame in playing with a with a written out cheat sheet of hands next to you. Should you want to brush up before attending or if you are a first time player, a good overview can be found at http://www.texasholde....

Parking: A few spaces in the driveway, and then on Bowdoin Drive (across street).

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Texas Hold 'Em Poker Night
